panels.title: Top tasks running time by index pattern

targets.query: elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid AND metricset.name: search_task AND elasticsearch.task.request.query:* AND ${text_search_filter:raw}

panels.title: Top ESQL tasks running time by index pattern

targets.query: elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid AND metricset.name: esql_task AND elasticsearch.task.request.query:* AND ${text_search_filter:raw}
